# Data programming in R CourseWork

## Importing libraries
```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(janitor)
```

## Reading the dataset
```{r}
dataset <- read.delim("clinical_dataset.tsv")
```

```{r}
View(dataset)
```

## Exploring the dataset
```{r}
str(dataset)
glimpse(dataset)
summary(dataset)
head(dataset)
```

## Make all column names consistent
```{r}
cleaned_dataset <- clean_names(dataset)
```
```{r}
View(cleaned_dataset)
```

## Remove duplicate rows
```{r}
cleaned_dataset <- dataset |> distinct()
str(dataset)
```

## Check missing values
```{r}
colSums(is.na(dataset))
```
